tr: the act of determining the properties of something, usually by research or calculation
the act of making up your mind about something
example: the burden of decision was his

tr: the quality of being determined to do or achieve something
example: his determination showed in his every movement
he is a man of purpose

tr: deciding or controlling something's outcome or nature
a position or opinion or judgment reached after consideration
example: a decision unfavorable to the opposition
his conclusion took the evidence into account

data.enText: the quality that makes you continue trying to do sth even when this is difficult

data.chText: 坚强的 / 不屈不挠的 / 顽强的决心

data.enText: He fought the illness with courage and determination.
data.chText: 他勇敢顽强地与疾病作斗争。

data.enText: I admire her determination to get it right.
data.chText: 我赞赏她非把事情弄清楚的决心。

data.enText: They had survived by sheer determination.
data.chText: 他们全凭坚强的决心幸存下来。

data.enText: the process of deciding sth officially
factors influencing the determination of future policy
data.chText: 影响未来决策的各种因素

data.enText: the act of finding out or calculating sth
Both methods rely on the accurate determination of the pressure of the gas.
data.chText: 两种方法都依赖于对气体压力的准确测定。

simple_means.memory_skill: determinat(e) 坚决的 + -ion 行为,状态

ex.enText: He shows great determination to win the champion.
ex.chText: 他表现出很大的决心要赢得冠军。

ex.enText: Her determination helped her survive the ordeal.
ex.chText: 她的坚韧帮助她渡过了难关。

synonyms.bx: 指即使遇到困难也能够坚持到底的顽强意志力。

ex.enText: She has never met a boy with so much backbone.
ex.chText: 她从未见过这么有毅力的男孩。

ex.enText: I really admire your courage and backbone.
ex.chText: 我真的很佩服你的勇气和毅力。

ex.enText: He doesn't have the backbone to be a good climber.
ex.chText: 他不具备一个优秀登山运动员应有的毅力。

synonyms.bx: 指做成难做之事所需的意志力或品质。

example.ex: Everyone concerned acted with great courage and determination...
example.tran: 所有相关人员都表现出了极大的勇气和决心。

example.ex: He reaffirmed their determination to tackle inflation...
example.tran: 他重申了他们要解决通货膨胀问题的决心。

example.ex: His cooking reflects a determination to acknowledge his northern roots...
example.tran: 他的烹饪风格表明他决心承认自己根在北方的坚定决心。

example.ex: There was an expression of fierce determination on her face.
example.tran: 她的脸上流露出异常坚决的表情。

value.def: Determination is the quality that you show when you have decided to do something and you will not let anything stop you.
